sentence: I can highly recommend Sandy Lane if you have deep pockets the Cliff and Lone Star
We had an ocean front top floor room and it was lovely amazing views very clean and had a comfy bed
Gorgeous view from the balcony
I ended up being the lucky participant of the elegant hotels golf tournament
We arrived at 10 am to be greeted with a glass of champagne and a seat on the lounge with gorgeous views of the incredibly blue sea and white sand
A diamond jeweller was on hand to tempt us and a local artist entertained us with reggae music at dinner
Again good attentive wait staff and the kitchen service was speedy
The staff are awesome and really make you feel at home
The staff was very helpful and remembered our favorite drinks both breakfast and bar
Throughout the day whether at the beach or pool you were given bottled water fruit ice cream etc
The wife on one set in full sun and the husband would switch back and forth to another set to be in the shade
I do n’t know the rule on Barbados about drugs but I do know that according to The House Rules there is no smoking on balconies and patios
Taxis transfers spa etc etc If you like small boutique hotels this is the one
We only ate at Daphnes once and found it to be nice food but lacking in atmosphere and very expensive
The hotel is attached to Daphnes and Daphnes is not up to standard for a 5 star class hotel
Definitely would n’t have this guy as a front man at least not until he undertakes some training old dogs new tricks
All good aside from the attitude of the senior barman on the day who barely lifted his head for two minutes after we sat down
Might explain why they sold out to Mariot
The whole Elegant Resorts being bought by Mariot thing was what most of the guests were discussing although it does n’t seem to have resulted in any material changes yet
A lot of the staff appeared as though they had just given up
